summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3100 lux), and cloud levels (up 413 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1348 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5447 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 412.6m lower than yesterday, 956.6m lower than past week, 1347.6m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1460.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
